Webhosting UK Com Ltd. (WHUK), a renowned web hosting company in the UK since 2001, offers professional grade Linux/Windows VPS hosting service over Dell hardware hosted in Tier IV datacenter facility in the UK.

Sign up for any of our Linux or Windows VPS and exclusively avail the following benefits:

FREE 25GB R1Soft Backup for the first 6 months!
FREE Migration Assistance if moving to WHUK from another provider
Plesk Control Panel included as Standard Feature with every server

Use Coupon Code “VPSBACK” to avail free backup

This is a limited time offer and ends on Wednesday 4 May 2016, 11.59pm BST. So rush to get yours today!

Initiate a live chat with one of our friendly sales advisors to get advice on the best package selection and avail exclusive discounts.
